name: Fowl Play (yurglepop, ManicKobold, Shiraffetopus, LolBozo)
description:
You play as a demon stuck in the body of a chicken. With no weapons and a frail body, you need to use magic tethers to offload damage onto your enemies before the damage kills you. 

Left click to Tether to an enemy or dummy

Right click to Untether

Damage stacks on the player and is applied 1 at a time. Make sure your tethered when the damage bar fills up or else the damage will be applied to you instead, and kill you.

Tethering to special enemies will give you special buffs

Unicorn - reduces the damage of all sources to only one damage point. Allows you to go through dart traps

Gryphon - Speed boost. allows you to go through fire traps

Credits:
